Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Back again, huh?


Look at those two. They're still going
at it.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I mean those two squabblers over there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I want to investigate the <clr:0000>Ring Ruin nestled<clr:ffff>
in these hills, but some monsters have set
up camp there.<sp:0:4:0>I heard these two are competing to be
the town's top fighter, so I asked them
to <clr:0000>clear out the monsters<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But this is all they do!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want to investigate the <clr:0000>nestled Ring
Ruin<clr:ffff>, but some monsters have set up
camp there.<sp:0:4:0>I heard these two compete to be the
town's top fighter, so I asked them to
<clr:0000>clear out the monsters<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But this is all they do!
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>It must have been important. <sp:5:0:0>It's a shame
we don't yet know what they meant by
"sage" and "secret stone."
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I can't hear the monsters anymore.
Do you know if something happened?
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You got rid of all those monsters?! Wow!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>You should let those two know you
handled it.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>There's a <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>nestled<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>Ring Ruin <clr:ffff>inscribed with Zonai writing.<sp:0:4:0>What if the monsters destroy that
priceless artifact?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>*sigh* Why did I ask those two for help?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad>I don't care if they argue, but I want them
to <clr:0000>chase off the<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff> first.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you! I can't wait to get back to
my investigation.

Make sure to let those two know you took
care of the monsters. Not that I want to
see the looks on their faces, but... Well.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now that you've chased off the monsters,
I can go back to investigating the stone
slab in the Ring Ruin. Thank you!
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hey now! I've had to listen to them
bickering, so the least you can do is
listen to me complain.
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't worry, the monsters didn't get to
the <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff> in the ruins. Phew!

Y'know, it feels a little lonely without
those two arguing...
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Tired_01>Good grief. Those two really don't
get along...
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS>I can finally investigate without worrying
I'm about to get eaten!

Even better, the <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff> and its
precious writing are safe. You did
good work here.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Looks like the monsters are gone for
good. I can finally research in peace.

Best of all, the <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff> and the
precious writing carved on it are safe.
Thank you. Seriously.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Tired_01>I don't know what their problem is, but
those two are at each other's throats
from morning to night.
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is one of <clr:0000>five ring-shaped ruins<clr:ffff> that
fell in the area.<sp:0:4:0>They're all broken open except for the
<clr:0000>floating one <clr:ffff>within the village itself.<sp:0:4:0>When that happened, chambers with
<clr:0000>stone slabs <clr:ffff>were exposed. These slabs
provide rare examples of Zonai writing.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Someone placed them very carefully.
They must have been important objectsâ€”
I can't believe I get to study them!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Tauro has translated a bit of it already.<sp:0:4:0>This particular stone slab seems to detail
requirements for becoming a "sage."<sp:0:4:0>Apparently, not only did you need to be
exceptional in some way, you also needed
a secret stone.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I'd never heard of these secret stones
before reading this! <sp:5:0:0>There's still so much
mystery in the world.<sp:0:4:0>If you want the exact text, you can read
the <clr:0000>translation <clr:ffff>next to the stone slab.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Tired_01>I don't know what their problem is, but
even the rain doesn't slow them down.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:TalkPositive>They ignored the monsters and started
arguing as soon as one of them brought
up who was stronger.
Do they even care whether some awful
monster in the <clr:0000>nestled Ring Ruin<clr:ffff> destroys<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
that precious <clr:0000>slab<clr:ffff>?<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>I doubt it!
